name: Chad The Dolph
description:
Istanbul Technical University OTG Save The Jam Project (Theme :Evolution) 

Chad The Dolph is a third person shooter game that player can evolve or devolve enemies with magical skill in order to reach and kill Chad The Dolph.

there are 9 different enemy with 3 different Type

Apes : Monkey ==> Human ==> Smart Monkey

Dolphs: Dolphin ==> Walking Dolphin ==> Chad

Spiders: Spider ==> Exploding Spider ==> Robo Spider

9 different enemy drops 6 different gems that player can pickup and change weapon and reload ammo.

There are 15 different Weapons that comes from Combinations of 2 gems that last picked. Stronger the enemy, stronger the effect of the gem it drops.

And there is a Boss : Chad The Dolph 

Boss can be damaged only by Chad killer Shotgun Wich can be obtained by finisihing the arena fight and open boss room.

Note: After jam there was 1 week of development on the game.

Kutay Doğan - Developer 

Nisa Derici - Developer 

Ali Giray Toksoy - 3D prop/spider artist 

Omer Faruk Yanikoglu - Animator, 3D Prop/Character Artist 

Candan Kabay - 3D Prop artist 

Ceylan Tolunay - Concept artist 

Görkem Yılmaz - Sound Designer 

Batuhan Çolaklar - Music
